trans-unit.source: Keep the following security considerations in mind when you use the StorSimple virtual device:
trans-unit.target: Keep the following security considerations in mind when you use the StorSimple virtual device:

trans-unit.source: The virtual device is secured through your Microsoft Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: The virtual device is secured through your Microsoft Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: This means that if you are using the virtual device and your Azure subscription is compromised, the data stored on your virtual device is also susceptible.
trans-unit.target: This means that if you are using the virtual device and your Azure subscription is compromised, the data stored on your virtual device is also susceptible.

trans-unit.source: The public key of the certificate used to encrypt data stored in Azure StorSimple is securely made available to the Azure portal, and the private key is retained with the StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: The public key of the certificate used to encrypt data stored in Azure StorSimple is securely made available to the Azure portal, and the private key is retained with the StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: On the StorSimple virtual device, both the public and private keys are stored in Azure.
trans-unit.target: On the StorSimple virtual device, both the public and private keys are stored in Azure.

trans-unit.source: The virtual device is hosted in the Microsoft Azure datacenter.
trans-unit.target: The virtual device is hosted in the Microsoft Azure datacenter.
